resources.string: Select your course to start learning!

string-array.name: course1Text1
string-array.item: Investing is the act of allocating capital, usually money, with the expectation of generating an income or profit.

Capital can be raised by entrepreneurs, businesses and Governments to meet their various funding requirements. This could include funding a new start-up, an existing business, new product development or to meet Government spending objectives.

The financial system plays a key role as an intermediary, facilitating the flow of capital from investors and those seeking to raise or borrow funds. This includes the share market, fund managers and banks.
